deliverItems.item: Contributed to the first version of the product, building new features, integrating designs, branding
Built and maintained a custom, scalable UI framework to be used on any device, anywhere
Various 3rd party and social media integrations
Built multiple landing pages during launch

how.title: My involvement
how.thoughts: I owned the UI/front-end of the platform (a marketplace for Indie Authors), as part of a 2-man, remote dev team.
